Name: Edison Patricio
description:
Patricio is a happily married farmer who lives with his spouse, who assists with his work of selling fertilizers locally. His children attend the school in the community. They live on a farm located in the mountains where most of the population makes a living through farming. They have taken advantage of the opportunity to work in agriculture, and they are very dedicated.

He dreams of having his own home and of paying for his childrenâ€™s education.

For this reason, he would like to receive a loan to purchase compost, fertilizers and other agricultural supplies. This will allow him to increase his merchandise and improve his sales and therefore, his profitability.
